text: Is there any user friendly html based word processor like Authorea (lacks html export, sharing needs premium), where I can render html within the document? I need to render my plotly based plots with images, latex, etc

elements.text: Is there any user friendly html based word processor like Authorea (lacks html export, sharing needs premium), where I can render html within the document? I need to render my plotly based plots with images, latex, etc

text: Atom + plugins? I don't know how Authorrea works, but I know Atom is very extensible. Probably VsCode too.

text: Would it render html images in a WYSIWYG manner? Be able to output in html format without too much formatting work?
